summary:
Proof of FRENS - Proof of Frens is a revolutionary cryptocurrency system built on the foundation of friendship and trust. Forget traditional consensus mechanisms; we bring you Proof-of-Frens (PoF). In the Frens ecosystem, every transaction is powered by the bonds between pals, and every block is a celebration of camaraderie. Let’s build this blockchain with friendship, where every block is a new fren!

  -
